channel.title: General Food Birthday Wordpress Ecto on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Food Birthday Wordpress Ecto on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Ecto!! w00t. nee blog software.
item.description: I am testing using ecto to post to wordpress. if this works i will probably purchase ecto. I really feel like i am desecrating all that is holy by using wordpress. for some reason i feel that writing all my own software is the way to go - although this is really nice and fancy. i do like the features. but i hate some of the more commercial parts. stupid commercial.
